hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Subnet
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Subnet where the Notebook will be created

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SSH_Key_Name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Key name at AWS to be used for accessing Jupyter

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Users_SSH_Key_Name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Users key name to be passed into Jupyter

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SSN_SG_ids
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The ID of the SSN Security Group to be accessible

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rand=`openssl rand -hex 10`; echo '{}'| sudo docker run -i -v /project_images/user_keys:/root/keys/.ssh -v /project_images/${SSH_Key_Name}.pem:/root/keys/${SSH_Key_Name}.pem -v /home/ubuntu:/response -e "request_id=$rand" -e "user_keyname=$Users_SSH_Key_Name" -e "conf_service_base_name=${Service_base_name}" -e "creds_region=$Region" -e "creds_key_name=$SSH_Key_Name" -e "notebook_subnet_cidr=$Subnet" -e "notebook_user_name=$Username" -e "creds_security_groups_ids=$SSN_SG_ids" docker.epmc-bdcc.projects.epam.com/dlab-aws-jupyter --action $Action
